title: Smart Home Dashboard
description: A comprehensive IoT dashboard for smart home control using React. Features real-time data visualization, device control panels, and customizable user interfaces.

title: AI Image Generator
description: An advanced image generation application using stable diffusion models to create high-quality images from text descriptions. Integrates multiple AI models for diverse artistic styles.
tech: Next.js, Tailwind CSS, Stable Diffusion API, Python

title: Crypto Portfolio Tracker
description: A real-time cryptocurrency portfolio tracker with advanced analytics. Track investments, analyze performance, and get market insights with customizable alerts and reports.
